```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.width = 10,
  fig.asp = .2,
  out.width = "90%",
  dpi = 300
)
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
crime_df = read_csv("data/crime_df.csv")
head(crime_df)
```

```{r, message=FALSE}
crime_plot =
  crime_df %>% 
  filter(!is.na(borough)) %>%
  plot_ly(
    lat = ~latitude, 
    lon = ~longitude, 
    frame = ~hour_of_day,
    type = "scattermapbox", 
    mode = "markers", 
    alpha = 0.2,
    color = ~borough) %>% 
  layout(
    mapbox = list(
      style = 'carto-positron',
      zoom = 9,
      center = list(lon = -73.9, lat = 40.7)))
crime_plot
```
